bibl.title: A Tax List from the Mendesios of the Time of Augustus.

bibl.author: VERRETH, Herbert

bibl.note: Mendesios (?), ca. 11-12 A.D. - Pp. 463-471: Toponyms; - 471-476: Anthroponyms.
VERRETH Herbert, A Tax List from the Mendesios of the Time of Augustus.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 455-476, 1 pl.
